short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple Chrome extension to toggle console logs for Topview.ai

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is exclusively designed for use with the Topview.ai website. It provides a toggle switch to enable or disable logging display in the DevTools panel, allowing developers to easily control the visibility of logs while working on the site.
